message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $14,000, but this is my final offer.  It's still a great price for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.  Let me know if you're interested.

Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm willing to pay $13,200 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.
